title: Sunset
description: True Blood has some competition . . .The first book of the gay vampire saga Pact Arcanum , Sunset tracks the Daywalker Nicholas as he fights for peace among the Human, Sentinel, Nightwalker, and Daywalker races.Vampires and vampire slayers are exposed on national television.Can they live in peace with humanity, or is war inevitable?If you want to read a gritty, adult answer to the Twilight Saga , look no further.For more details about Arshad, to read the full reviews, or to sign up for the newsletter, check out the author's website at pactarcanum.com .Search on " Pact Arcanum " to find all the books in the series.
author: Arshad Ahsanuddin
